DOC.brief_summary: Patients with Interstitial Cystitis / PBS will be treated with bladder thermal distention (BTD).
DOC.brief_title: Bladder Thermal Distention for Patients With Interstitial Cystitis / Painful Bladder Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: In this study we will evaluate the efficacy of bladder thermal distention (BTD) in patients with IC/PBS. Patients with previous failed conventional treatment (intravesical DMSO) will be recruited.
DOC.criteria: All patients with interstitial cystitis / painful bladder syndrome (IC/PBS) who had previous intravesical treatment with DMSO Active infection Urethral stricture
